description: |-
  Unwraps (imports) encrypted key material onto a PKCS#11 token using C_UnwrapKey. The unwrapped object's attributes (label, class, key_type, etc.) are determined by the HSM from the wrapped blob and are exposed as computed outputs.
---

# pkcs11_unwrapped_key (Resource)

Unwraps (imports) encrypted key material onto a PKCS#11 token using C_UnwrapKey. The unwrapped object's attributes (label, class, key_type, etc.) are determined by the HSM from the wrapped blob and are exposed as computed outputs.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `mechanism` (String) Unwrapping mechanism name (e.g., CKM_YUBICO_AES_CCM_WRAP). Accepts name with or without CKM_ prefix, or numeric value.
- `unwrapping_key_label` (String) Label of the unwrapping key on the token.
- `wrapped_key_material` (String, Sensitive) The wrapped (encrypted) key material, base64-encoded.

### Optional

- `unwrapping_key_class` (String) Object class of the unwrapping key (default: CKO_SECRET_KEY).

### Read-Only

- `ac_issuer` (String) PKCS#11 attribute ac_issuer (base64-encoded, computed from wrapped blob).
- `always_authenticate` (Boolean) PKCS#11 attribute always_authenticate (computed from wrapped blob).
- `always_sensitive` (Boolean) PKCS#11 attribute always_sensitive (computed from wrapped blob).
- `application` (String) PKCS#11 attribute application (computed from wrapped blob).
- `attr_types` (String) PKCS#11 attribute attr_types (base64-encoded, computed from wrapped blob).
- `base` (String) PKCS#11 attribute base (hex-encoded, computed from wrapped blob).
- `bits_per_pixel` (Number) PKCS#11 attribute bits_per_pixel (computed from wrapped blob).
